content: आरक्ष {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Preserved, defended, fit to be protected. --क्षः, --क्षा {@--1@} Protection, preservation, guard; आरक्षे मध्यमे स्थितान् Rām; <ls>Śānti. 3. 5</ls>; <ls>Ms. 3. 204.</ls> {@--2@} The junction of the frontal sinuses of an elephant (कंभसंधि). {@--3@} The part of the forehead below this junction. {@--4@} An army.
